balance.title: Weapons possessed

- Includes equipment in store
- Air Defense: number of launchers is shown
- Tanks: includes T-62 and above
- IFVs: includes BMD, BTR-80A and above, BTR-3 and above
- Sources: iiss.org, armedforces.eu, globalsecurity.org, wikipedia.org

- Air Defense: number of launchers is shown
- IFVs: includes all Bradley and Stryker variants

report.banner_title: Protect Ukraine now before it's too late!
report.title: Military Aid to Ukraine

news.title: News about military aid to Ukraine
news.description: The Dutch Cabinet will look into supplying F-16 fighter jets to Ukraine

about.title: About Us
about.project_description: U.S. Senators Dan Sullivan (R-Alaska), and four other senators sent a letter to Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin and Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff General Mark Milley U.S. Senators Dan Sullivan (R-Alaska), and four other senators sent a letter to Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin and Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff General Mark Milley
about.contact_us_cta_text: U.S. Senators Dan Sullivan (R-Alaska), and four other senators sent a letter to Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin and Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff General Mark Milley, asking them to immediately expedite shipments of military equipment to Ukraine as appropriated by Congress under the Additional Ukraine Supplemental Appropriations Act. Passed on May 19, Equipment recommended for immediate delivery includes medium- and long-range air defense systems, 155 mm howitzers.
about.donate_description: This project is completely volunteer, so we will need finances to offer it, so support us so we can continue to help Ukraine!

root.title: Protect Ukraine NOW!
root.description:
Russia launched the most unprecedented missile attack across the entire Ukraine targeting critical infrastructure and slaughtering civilians. By October, tens of thousands of civilians had been killed, including more than 400 children.

Significantly MORE MILITARY AID is needed urgently. Time to act is NOW before more children are killed.​

letter.title: Request your representatives to give Ukraine the munitions to end this war
letter.description:
- Innocent people are killed in their homes every day; on Christmas Eve 17 civilians were killed and 71 were wounded

- Ukraine's victory is essential for global stability and the US security

- General Zaloujny is ready to end this war:

    > “I know that I can beat this enemy. But I need resources. I need 300 tanks, 600-700 IFVs, 500 Howitzers”

candidates.title: Ask your candidate about Ukraine support
candidates.description: Without western support Ukraine resistance will crumble. It is essential for world peace and US security that Ukraine emerges victorious from this war

about.title: Про нас
about.project_description: U.S. Senators Dan Sullivan (R-Alaska), and four other senators sent a letter to Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin and Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff General Mark Milley U.S. Senators Dan Sullivan (R-Alaska), and four other senators sent a letter to Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin and Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff General Mark Milley
about.contact_us_cta_text: U.S. Senators Dan Sullivan (R-Alaska), and four other senators sent a letter to Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin and Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff General Mark Milley, asking them to immediately expedite shipments of military equipment to Ukraine as appropriated by Congress under the Additional Ukraine Supplemental Appropriations Act. Passed on May 19, Equipment recommended for immediate delivery includes medium- and long-range air defense systems, 155 mm howitzers.
about.donate_description: This project is completely volunteer, so we will need finances to offer it, so support us so we can continue to help Ukraine!

letter.title: Вимагайте від своїх представників надати Україні зброю перемоги
letter.description:
- Невинних людей щодня вбивають у їхніх будинках; на Святвечір було вбито 17 мирних жителів, 71 поранено

- Перемога України є важливою для глобальної стабільності та безпеки США

- Генерал Залужний готовий закінчити цю війну: 

    > «Я знаю, що можу перемогти цього ворога. Але мені потрібні ресурси. Мені потрібно 300 танків, 600-700 БМП, 500 гаубиць»

candidates.title: Запитайте кандидата щодо підтримки України
candidates.description: Без підтримки Заходу опір України впаде. Для миру у світі та безпеки США важливо, щоб Україна вийшла з цієї війни переможцем
